title: Escape Room Buffalo, a puzzle-based escape game, opens in North Tonawanda
text:
Published By: Buffalow News: Business - Today 
Escape Room Buffalo will open in North Tonawanda Wednesday.In the real-time puzzle adventure game, a group of players is closed inside a the... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
